description: Conversion to provide 35 live-work, 13 commercial, 26 residential units, alterations including roof extension and parking.
decision_conditions:
1. Strong objection to roof extension, there are long views from Islington and also the building is already highly developed. 

 2. Strong objection to changing the windows on the north elevation and also to projecting balconies and tower on the west end of the canal. 

 3. Properties in LBI opposite should be consulted. 

 4. No observations on proposed uses. 

 5. You may wish to consider changing your consultation letter to refer to Article 10 of the Town and Country Planning (General Development Procedure ) Order 1995.
